014package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded;
015
016import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018import static java.lang.String.format;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.FileOutputStream;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.nio.channels.FileLock;
025import java.security.DigestInputStream;
026import java.security.MessageDigest;
027import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
030import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
031import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
032import java.util.function.Supplier;
033
034import com.google.common.base.Suppliers;
035import com.google.common.io.BaseEncoding;
036import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
037import org.slf4j.Logger;
038import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
039
040public class UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver implements PgDirectoryResolver {
041
042    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver.class);
043
044    private static final String INSTALL_DIRECTORY_PREFIX = "PG-";
045
046    private static final Supplier<UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver> DEFAULT_INSTANCE_HOLDER =
047            Suppliers.memoize(UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver::new);
048
049    private static final Map<PgArchiveResolver, File> KNOWN_INSTALLATIONS = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
050
051    private final Lock prepareBinariesLock = new ReentrantLock();
052
053    private final PgArchiveResolver pgArchiveResolver;
054
055    public static synchronized UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver getDefault() {
056        return DEFAULT_INSTANCE_HOLDER.get();
057    }
058
059    private UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver() {
060        this(ZonkyIOPostgresArchiveResolver.INSTANCE);
061    }
062
063    public UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver(PgArchiveResolver pgArchiveResolver) {
064        this.pgArchiveResolver = checkNotNull(pgArchiveResolver, "pgArchiveResolver is null");
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public File getDirectory(final File installationDirectory) {
069        prepareBinariesLock.lock();
070        try {
071            if (KNOWN_INSTALLATIONS.containsKey(pgArchiveResolver)) {
072                File pgDir = KNOWN_INSTALLATIONS.get(pgArchiveResolver);
073                if (pgDir.exists()) {
074                    return pgDir;
075                }
076            }
077
078            final String system = EmbeddedUtil.getOS();
079            final String machineHardware = EmbeddedUtil.getArchitecture();
080
081            LOG.debug(format("Detected a %s %s system", system, machineHardware));
082
083            String pgDigest;
084            try (InputStream pgArchive = pgArchiveResolver.locatePgArchive(system, machineHardware)) {
085                checkState(pgArchive != null, "No Postgres archive found for " + system + " / " + machineHardware);
086                try (DigestInputStream pgArchiveData = new DigestInputStream(pgArchive, MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5"))) {
087                    ByteStreams.exhaust(pgArchiveData);
088                    pgDigest = BaseEncoding.base16().encode(pgArchiveData.getMessageDigest().digest());
089                }
090            }
091
092            File pgDir;
093            if (!installationDirectory.setWritable(true, false)) {
094                LOG.warn(format("Could not make install directory %s writable!", installationDirectory));
095            }
096
097            pgDir = new File(installationDirectory, INSTALL_DIRECTORY_PREFIX + pgDigest);
098
099            EmbeddedUtil.mkdirs(pgDir);
100
101            final File unpackLockFile = new File(pgDir, EmbeddedPostgres.LOCK_FILE_NAME);
102
103            if (pgDir.getName().startsWith(INSTALL_DIRECTORY_PREFIX)) {
104                final File pgDirExists = new File(pgDir, ".exists");
105                if (!pgDirExists.exists()) {
106                    try (FileOutputStream lockStream = new FileOutputStream(unpackLockFile);
107                            FileLock unpackLock = lockStream.getChannel().tryLock()) {
108                        if (unpackLock != null) {
109                            try {
110                                checkState(!pgDirExists.exists(), "unpack lock acquired but .exists file is present " + pgDirExists);
111                                LOG.info("extracting archive...");
112                                InputStream x = pgArchiveResolver.locatePgArchive(system, machineHardware);
113                                EmbeddedUtil.extractTxz(x, pgDir.getPath());
114                                checkState(pgDirExists.createNewFile(), "couldn't make .exists file " + pgDirExists);
115                            } catch (Exception e) {
116                                LOG.error("while unpacking archive:", e);
117                            }
118                        } else {
119                            // the other guy is unpacking for us.
120                            int maxAttempts = 60;
121                            while (!pgDirExists.exists() && --maxAttempts > 0) { // NOPMD
122                                Thread.sleep(1000L);
123                            }
124                            checkState(pgDirExists.exists(), "Waited 60 seconds for postgres to be unpacked but it never finished!");
125                        }
126                    } finally {
127                        if (unpackLockFile.exists() && !unpackLockFile.delete()) {
128                            LOG.error(format("could not remove lock file %s", unpackLockFile.getAbsolutePath()));
129                        }
130                    }
131                }
132            }
133
134            KNOWN_INSTALLATIONS.putIfAbsent(pgArchiveResolver, pgDir);
135            LOG.debug(format("Unpacked archive at %s", pgDir));
136            return pgDir;
137        } catch (final IOException | NoSuchAlgorithmException e) {
138            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError(e);
139        } catch (final InterruptedException e) {
140            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
141            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError(e);
142        } finally {
143            prepareBinariesLock.unlock();
144        }
145    }
146}
